title: Neoliberal econ policy includes lower barriers

content.question: Which of the following is a neoliberal economic policy?

choices.label: Nationalizing important sectors of the economy
Increasing regulatory oversight and state control over industry
Reducing trade barriers and rolling back state intervention in the economy
Providing a direct transfer of money to older people and people of lower socioeconomic status

content.answer: Reducing trade barriers and rolling back state intervention in the economy

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
